    • Method Detail

      • getInvocationStrategy

        protected InvocationStrategy getInvocationStrategy(Savepoint savepoint,
                                       Method method,
                                       Object[] parameters)
        Description copied from class: AbstractInvocationHandler
        Returns the appropriate InvocationStrategy for the specified method. This implementation detects Wrapper methods; and Object.equals(java.lang.Object), Object.hashCode(), and Object.toString(). Default invocation strategy is InvokeOnAllInvocationStrategy.
        Overrides:
        getInvocationStrategy in class AbstractInvocationHandler<Z,D extends Database<Z>,Savepoint,SQLException>
        Parameters:
        savepoint - the proxied object
        method - the method to invoke
        parameters - the method invocation parameters
        Returns:
        an invocation strategy
        See Also:
        AbstractInvocationHandler.getInvocationStrategy(java.lang.Object, java.lang.reflect.Method, java.lang.Object[])
